text: Tradewinds Hotel is a luxury hotel in Ottoville, American Samoa.The hotel features a 20-acre beachfront and contains 104 guest rooms, 43 suites and 8 large suites. is served by the Equator restaurant which uses inspiration from local Samoan cooking the cook American, European, Pacific and Asian cuisine. The hotel hosted the Miss Island Queen Pageant in 2009. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Hotels in American Samoa Category:Hotels established in 2003 Category:Hotel buildings completed in 2003
title: Tradewinds Hotel
